meanings.definition: A sector that is part of a larger sector.
meanings.sent1: The technology subsector focuses on innovations within the larger tech industry.
meanings.sent2: The education subsector includes schools, colleges, and universities.
meanings.sent3: In the world of fashion, the subsector of accessories adds flair to outfits.
meanings.sent4: The subsector of music within the entertainment industry hits all the right notes.
meanings.sent5: Exploring the subsector of wildlife photography opens up a whole new world of beauty.

meanings.definition: A subdivision of a larger sector.
meanings.sent1: The healthcare subsector deals with specific medical fields like cardiology and pediatrics.
meanings.sent2: The transportation subsector includes modes like air travel, railways, and shipping.
meanings.sent3: The subsector of desserts in the culinary world always brings a sweet ending to meals.
meanings.sent4: Within the art subsector, abstract paintings evoke deep emotions and interpretations.
meanings.sent5: Exploring the subsector of marine biology reveals the wonders of ocean life.
